definition: to use foreigners to subdue foreigners (idiom); let the barbarians fight it out among themselves (traditional policy of successive dynasties)/Use Western science and technology to counter imperialist encroachment. (late Qing modernizing slogan)
old variant of 以[yi3]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
old variant of 以[yi3]

to manufacture/to make

sentences.english: The third one was making use of the conflict among big powers.

definition: divide and rule (strategy)/divide and conquer
use Chinese collaborators to subdue the Chinese (imperialist policy)
to enlist enemy or rebel soldiers by offering amnesty/to bring to negotiated surrender

a national policy
the Qing court (as government of China)
to resist foreign aggression and pacify the interior of the country (idiom)
